name: broken mysterious robot
description: A gigantic heap of weird metal parts, hoses, pipes and plutonium. It makes no sense as far as your electronical knowledge is concerned, but it can always be gutted for parts.

name: pair of nekomata tails
description: A pair of feline tails, grewn together in a otherwordly but charming manner. Eating them could potentialy mutate you into a more purr-fect form.
